each_product.name: Yoga Mat green
each_product.description:
Product Description
Introducing our new product – yoga mats! Ideal for performing ground exercises such as push-ups, planks, stretching and mobility. No more using mats that everyone has access to. No more exercising on the floor. Minimalist design and highest quality.
Dimensions
Length 185 cm | 72,83 in
Width 65 cm | 25,6 in
Thickness 5 cm | 1,97 in
Other features
Top layer made of natural rubber
The bottom of the mat has anti-slip properties
Easy to clean
Available in 2 colors!

each_product.name: Hand grips
each_product.description:
Gymnastic grips are a great solution for people who want to get more out of their workouts! Thanks to them, you will strengthen your grip and save your hands from excessive abrasions. Perfect for performing all exercises on the bar.
Product description:
Made from natural leather.
Minimalist design.
Velcro closure.
Additional features:
Sold as a set (2 pieces).
Available in two sizes.

each_product.name: Massage ball set
each_product.description:
Set of two massage balls – classic and duoball. They assist in self-massage of tense muscles, significantly speeding up your recovery after a workout!
Product description:
Material: EPP foam
Dimensions of ball 1: 8 cm diameter
Dimensions of ball 2: 8 cm diameter each, total length 16 cm
Available in various colors.

each_product.name: Minibands set
each_product.description:
Mini bands set includes 5 short resistance bands that will work perfectly in your home gym.
Product description:

Band length: 30 cm
Resistance:
Green (2-4kg) Blue (4-7kg) Yellow (9-16kg) Red (13-20kg) Black (18-23kg)

each_product.name: Tape
each_product.description:

Description:

Width: 3.8 cm

each_product.name: Ankle/ wrist weights 2×0.5 kg
each_product.description:
Can be used on ankles or wrists!
Ankle weights are a fantastic addition to your home gym. Performing exercises with weighted progressions significantly accelerates the learning process. They also work well in classic exercises such as dragon flags or leg raises.

Sold as a set of 2 pieces

each_product.name: Parallettes 60 cm + liquid chalk 50 ml
each_product.description:
Caliathletics parallettes are the best push up bars on the market. What exactly are you paying for?
– our parallettes are 100% hand crafted, from the highest quality beech wood
– the glued handle guarantees that the wood will not twist and the parallettes will not be crooked after some time (this is a common case with cheaper models of parallettes)
– the thickness of the handle is a major aspect when performing the exercises, so as a few we decided to use a 4 cm beech handle (best possible choice!)
– parallettes are impregnated with a special wax, thanks to which the wood is protected and your hands will not slip
– parallel bars are equipped with anti-slip pads, so that you can train on any surface!
– easy to transport – you can train even on vacation!
Liquid chalk 50 ml
– increases friction between your hands and the bar
– makes your grip stronger
– easy to apply

each_product.name: Resistance band Green
each_product.description:
Why is it worth getting a resistance band? Resistance rubber is used for warming up and to make basic exercises easier or more difficult. It also helps with learning calisthenic elements. You still don’t have the strength to do your first pull-up or your first Muscle up? The resistance band will help you achieve this!
In our offer you will also find a set of 4 resistance rubbers.
-Made of 100% latex
-Easy to clean (just clean with a damp sponge)
-Thickness 4.5 mm, width 50 mm.
Training bands come in different colors and thicknesses, not by chance. The thinner the gum, the less it will help you. So how do you choose the color of the exercise band? In fact, all colors of rubber will be useful in training. Training bands can be used for many different exercises and levels of advancement. How does it look in practice? Let’s assume that your goal is 5 pull-ups and you start with 1. You can use green rubber to develop the correct technique, get your body used to working in full range of motion, and slowly strengthen your muscles. After a few workouts, you will change the color of the rubber to purple (which makes it more difficult for you). And so on However, if you are wondering how rubbers can make exercise difficult for you, we recommend trying to do a series of push-ups with rubbers.

each_product.name: Wrist Wraps Black
each_product.description:
Caliathletics wrist wraps will let you discover a new form of training!
Designed by athletes, made by professionals. It does not matter if you are a beginner or more advanced calisthenics athlete. You will immediately feel the benefits of using this equipment. Wrist wraps stabilize your wrist and ensure even distribution of tension and weight. Want to do more reps? Want to be less exposed to injuries? This product is for you!
What are you paying for?
– handmade in Poland, by professionals in their field
– made of breathable and lightweight material
– provide comfort during training
– help to avoid injuries
– easy to wash
– universal size
Wrist wraps are available in 6 colors and are sold in pairs. Express yourself and take care of your joints!

each_product.name: Liquid chalk 250 ml
each_product.description:
Liquid Chalk is an excellent choice for people who want to improve their grip and reduce hand sweating. Because of liquid chalk, you will be able to perform more repetitions, and thus increase your progress. It reduces the risk of bars or weights slipping out of the hand and of the risk of having an injury. In our offer, you will find liquid chalk in a convenient 50ml and 250 ml package, so you can easily take it with you to training.
It is eagerly chosen by people who practice various types of sports, because it guarantees:
better friction
strong and secure grip
excellent hand grip
less sweating of the hands during training
dry hands
lower risk of injury
Who is it for?
It is perfect for all those who want to increase their grip strength. Therefore, if you practice sports such as calisthenics, bodybuilding, crossfit or pole dance – liquid chalk is a must-have. No matter if you are a beginner or more advanced athlete. The product creates a coating so that your hands do not sweat, and you can confidently make certain movements, thus ensuring your own safety.
Application method:
Before use, shake the bottle with the product, then apply a few drops on your hands, rub it in thoroughly and wait until it dries. After training, wash your hands thoroughly with cool water and use moisturizing creams.

each_product.description: Express yourself with our silicone wristband. Not only will you show others that you are training calisthenics, but that you are also part of the best Caliathletics community and family!

each_product.name: Silicone Wristband White
each_product.description: Express yourself with our silicone wristband. Not only will you show others that you are training calisthenics, but that you are also part of the best Caliathletics community and family!

each_product.name: Workout Rings – Caliathletics
each_product.description:
Workout Rings is the perfect tool for your home and outdoor training. It will let you perform most of the bodyweight exercises, additionally engaging more muscle groups responsible for stabilization. Easy to adjust system will let you set rings on proper height within seconds.
● Tested and designed by professionals
● 32mm grip perfectly comfortable and stable
● High quality and 400kg tested

each_product.name: Caliathletics Wooden Parallettes MINI 30 cm | 12 in
each_product.description:
Parallettes, or so-called push-up bars, are a great workout device that will allow you to diversify your training sessions. From push-ups, handstands, and other basic exercises to more advanced L-sit, V-sit and planche. Such small equipment, so many possibilities! All it takes is a bit of time and determination to master all the exercises. It does not matter if you are just starting your adventure with calisthenics, or if you are already a more advanced athlete. You will definitely see the advantages of training with parallettes!
Caliathletics parallettes are the best push up bars on the market. What exactly are you paying for?
– our parallettes are 100% hand crafted, from the highest quality beech wood
– the glued handle guarantees that the wood will not twist and the parallettes will not be crooked after some time (this is a common case with cheaper models of parallettes)
– the thickness of the handle is a major aspect when performing the exercises, so as a few we decided to use a 4 cm beech handle (best possible choice!)
– parallettes are impregnated with a special wax, thanks to which the wood is protected and your hands will not slip
– parallel bars are equipped with anti-slip pads, so that you can train on any surface!
– easy to transport – you can train even on vacation!
Why is it worth exercising on parallettes? In addition to the above-mentioned advantages (variety of exercises and new ways of training), it is also worth emphasizing the health aspect. Parallettes put our wrists in a neutral position – our joints will be less vulnerable to injuries than when performing exercises on the ground (for example, push-up). By performing several hundred of push-ups a year, your joints will feel a huge difference!

each_product.name: Pull up bar (wall)
each_product.description:
Product Description:
The latest product from Caliathletics: a wall-mounted pull-up bar. Excellent for performing exercises in your home gym. The bar is made of high-quality steel and coated with black, textured powder paint. This ensures a secure and strong grip for your hands. It’s a reliable piece of equipment that will last you for years. You can be confident that it will meet all your expectations!
Dimensions:
Bar Length: 95 cm
Distance from the wall: 53.5 cm
Bar Height: 54.7 cm
Grip Diameter: 33.7 mm
Steel Thickness: 3 mm
Additional Features:
Coated with textured powder paint!
Assembly instructions included, along with the necessary screws!
Designed for wall mounting.

each_product.description:

each_product.name: Caliathletics Low Metal Parallettes
each_product.description:
Low Metal Parallettes with metal feet, is a product that was created to combine functionality and design. The 50 cm long beech handle is supported by two steel feet, which guarantee stability during workouts. Minimalistic look, non-slip pads and the highest quality materials all combined, so that you could train like a pro!
The ergonomic handle has been designed to relieve our wrist joints as much as possible. When performing classic push-ups or handstand on the ground, our wrists are in an unnatural position, but thanks to our parallettes your joints will be in neutral position which reduces the risk of an injury.
Caliathletics Low Parallettes are the perfect choice for beginners, intermediate, and professionals. See for yourself!
Product advantages
Ergonomic, wrist-friendly grip.
Extremely stable and durable.
Useful on any terrain.
Equipped with non-slip pads.

each_product.name: Handstand blocks
each_product.description:
Handstand blocks are quite a unique product. Why? Handstand with blocks is a completely different challenge. The product is dedicated to both beginners and more advanced. You don’t know how to learn to handstand? Our blocks will help you better feel the balance and relieve your wrists.
100% handmade
made from the highest quality materials, natural beech wood
have non-slip pads
will make you a master of handstand!

each_product.name: Weighted Vest 10 kg | 22 lb
each_product.description:
Let us guess. You are at the stage where performing classic calisthenic training – only with your own body weight, is not enough for you anymore, right? You want more. You want to discover new challenges! You want to diversify your training and work on push-ups, pull-ups and other exercises in a completely new edition! We understand you perfectly, that’s why we have created this weighted vest.
It is easy to put on (Velcro system) and even easier to take off. You decide what load you are wearing (1 kg | 2.2 lb bags that can be removed at any time). Do you want to discover a new face of calisthenics? Just order one!

each_product.name: Caliathletics Weighted Belt
each_product.description:
Caliathletics weighted belt – Designed by Athletes, Made by Professionals.
Belt for pull-ups, dips, and many other exercises performed with the use of additional weight. The durable material is additionally reinforced with the RIP-STOP technique. This allows you to do high-intensity workouts with suspended kettles or plates. The chain is made of steel with snap hooks on both sides – you can easily adjust the belt to your needs. The chain length is 100cm.
Why you should get our training belt? Firstly, we know what we are doing. For years, we have been passionate about calisthenics training and its variations (in this case, weighted calisthenics). The belt (as well as other products) was designed based on our knowledge and experience.
Looking for a way to challenge yourself? Want to try something new? Then this product is definitely for you!
